attributes.action: Referendum on local government power to introduce road traffic policies.
attributes.additional_details: The Polish government is holding a national referendum on the same day as national elections on October 15. We should do the same at the next general election on local government powers to introduce ultra-low emission zones (ULEZ) and 15-minute cities which we believe are being implemented against the will of the people. There are better alternatives that could be considered instead such as walking to school schemes.
attributes.background: We want a referendum on local government powers to introduce road charging schemes such as ULEZ, 20 mph zones and 15 minute city policies. This referendum should be held on the same day as the general election.
